channel.title: Blogdown on Thug R Life
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Thug R Life

item.title: Making this Blog
item.description: blogdown magic I made this blog using the magic of blogdown which is a framework that joins together a few technologies to make ‘static websites’ RMarkdown Hugo RMarkdown RMarkdown is an interface from R to markdown which is a way of marking up a text document with formating so other tools can convert it from a text file to a pretty format (PDF, Word, etc.) It’s a great way of documenting your code by having your narrative right next to the code that generated the insights/results.
